    • Method Detail

      • executeReadOnlyTransaction

        public <T> T executeReadOnlyTransaction(SessionWork<T> sessionWork)
        Execute the specified sessionWork in a session configured for read-only interactions with the database. This method should be used for select queries.

        In case of a transaction failure a retry is performed or not based on the value defined by PASchedulerProperties.SCHEDULER_DB_TRANSACTION_MAXIMUM_RETRIES.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the result type of the session work.
        Parameters:
        sessionWork - the action to perform.
        Returns:
        session work result based on the generic type.

      • executeReadOnlyTransaction

        public <T> T executeReadOnlyTransaction(SessionWork<T> sessionWork,
                                        Interceptor interceptor)

      • executeReadWriteTransaction

        public <T> T executeReadWriteTransaction(SessionWork<T> sessionWork)
        Execute the specified sessionWork in a session configured for read/write interactions with the database. This method should be used for insert, update, and delete queries. If select only is required, then executeReadOnlyTransaction(SessionWork) could be used.

        In case of database error while executing the query, a rollback is performed and a retry executed depending of the value associated to the property PASchedulerProperties.SCHEDULER_DB_TRANSACTION_MAXIMUM_RETRIES.

        Type Parameters:
        T - the result type of the session work.
        Parameters:
        sessionWork - the action to perform.
        Returns:
        session work result based on the generic type.

      • executeReadWriteTransaction

        public <T> T executeReadWriteTransaction(SessionWork<T> sessionWork,
                                         boolean readOnlyEntities)
